name: Kolle Rebbe
tagline: Kolle Rebbe is simple: we believe in common sense.
description: Kolle Rebbe is simple: we believe in common sense. We’re owner-managed and independent and we work globally. We’re one of Germany’s most creative agencies. We don’t differentiate between conventional and digital communication, but between brand building and product innovation. We call this Creative Business Intelligence. As creative entrepreneurs we also support start-ups. We invest in good ideas to help business founders and to help ourselves.
